QuestData.Title: Unto Dust Thou Shalt Return
QuestData.Description: <You take the second anointed blade in hand and feel the power of both swords course through you.>$B$B<There is but one thing left to do. As the mysterious, hooded woman explained, to put an end to the Scarlet Crusade, you must thrust both blades into the corpse of High Inquisitor Whitemane.>
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Thrust the anointed blades into her corpse and bring a final end to the tyranny of the Scarlet Crusade.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Blades of the Anointed on the corpse of High Inquisitor Whitemane to send her permanently to her final rest.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The deed is not yet done. There can be no end to the Scarlet Crusade while Whitemane can come back from the dead.>
QuestData.RewardText: With Whitemane gone for good, the Scarlet Crusade is finished. It's just a matter of sweeping up the refuse.$B$BThank you, $p. Not just for myself, but for everyone opposed to mindless hatred and bigotry.$B$BAnd, thank you for these two new blades. Anointed anew in her blood, they should serve me well as I take the fight to Scholomance and deal with Darkmaster Gandling.$B$BI bid you adieu for now.

Objectives.Objective: Blades of the Anointed thrust into Whitemane's corpse
